name: upworm
description:
UPWORM is a physics challenge platformer. Guide your worm up the sculptures, can you reach the top?

Made for the Autumn 2021 Lisp Game Jam (using https://github.com/arcadia-unity/ArcadiaGodot)

TIPS: This is a challenging experience but it can be completed.  A two axis controller is a bit easier than using the keyboard.  For the harder jumps think of the worm as a spring that must be coiled.

Music by me, selfsame, made mainly this week for #looptober.

Sculpture scans courtesy of https://threedscans.com/  (free no license) and https://www.myminifactory.com/users/SMK%20-%20Statens%20Museum%20for%20Kunst?sho... (CC0).

Special thanks to amazing collection of The Statens Museum for Kunst (National Art Museum of Denmark), Bennet Foddy for the Getting-Over-It-like genre, the https://github.com/arcadia-unity/Arcadia team, Godot, Blender, the #looptober community
